Attacks.Name: Sacred Fire
Attacks.Effect: Inflicts damage and has a chance to Burn the target. If a wild is rolled, the Burn condition spreads to one additional character within range 2 of the target.

Attacks.Name: Sky Attack
Attacks.Effect: Deals heavy damage and Stuns the target if a wild is rolled.

Attacks.Name: Rainbow Blast
Attacks.Effect: A powerful attack that deals damage to all enemies within range 3. Targets hit by a wild are Blinded, reducing their attack rolls by 1.

Superpowers.Name: Rebirth
Superpowers.Effect: Once per game, when Ho-Oh would be KO’d, it instead recovers all Stamina and removes all conditions.

Superpowers.Name: Glide
Superpowers.Effect: Increases Ho-Oh's Movement to S for its next activation, allowing it to ignore terrain and characters.

Attacks.Name: Solar Wing
Attacks.Effect: This attack illuminates the battlefield, healing Ho-Oh for 1 damage for each enemy character hit. If a wild is rolled, enemies within range 2 of the target are Blinded for their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Flame of Life
Attacks.Effect: An attack that channels Ho-Oh's life force, redistributing damage dealt as health among allied characters within range 3. A wild roll grants Ho-Oh an additional power for each damage dealt.

Superpowers.Name: Phoenix Flame
Superpowers.Effect: Ho-Oh’s attacks gain +1 Strength. Additionally, once per round, it can remove a special condition from itself.
